name: Sumeet Agarwal
content: Sumeet Agarwal's Webpage [Home][Bio][Students][Research][Publications][Reports and Talks][Teaching][Miscellanea][Blog] Learning and Information in Networked Complex Systems (LINCS) Group, IIT Delhi [Image credits: Old Photo Profile, Naeblys Getty Images, Max Pixel] Our work focuses on understanding organised complexity and how it enables learning, information processing, and decision-making in networked natural systems: biological, cognitive, social. NEW: Possible new project directions for 2025–26 (drop me an e-mail if any of these appeal to you) PI Sumeet Agarwal Associate Professor Yardi School of Artificial Intelligence (Room 515C, Academic Complex East [directions]) Department of Electrical Engineering (previous appointment) Other affiliations: Cognitive Science Programme; School of Information Technology Indian Institute of Technology Delhi Hauz Khas, New Delhi – 110016 India +91-11-2659-6159 (Office) +91-11-2658-1606 (Fax) +91-11-2659-7719 (Residence) sumeet@iitd.ac.in lawraga.teemus@gmail.com Follow @lawraga [Home][Bio][Students][Research][Publications][Reports and Talks][Teaching][Miscellanea][Blog]
